                    &lt;br/&gt;
                  &lt;a class="plannedWorkDetailLink" onclick=ShowHide(191353);&gt;&lt;b&gt;ROCKAWAYS: FLOOD PROTECTION | Until September 3, 2018&lt;br clear=left&gt;No [A] trains running to Far Rockaway-Mott Av&lt;br clear=left&gt;No [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br/&gt;&lt;br/&gt;&lt;div id= 191353 class="plannedWorkDetail" &gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/b&gt;[A] trains run between &lt;b&gt;Inwood-207 St&lt;/b&gt;, Manhattan and &lt;b&gt;Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St&lt;/b&gt;, Queens.&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;The [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle runs, approximately &lt;i&gt;every 15 minutes,&lt;/i&gt; between &lt;b&gt;Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St&lt;/b&gt; and &lt;b&gt;Beach 90 St&lt;/b&gt; and via the [A]  &lt;i&gt;to/from&lt;/i&gt; &lt;b&gt;Far Rockaway-Mott Av&lt;/b&gt;.&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;For &lt;b&gt;Far Rockaway-Mott Av&lt;/b&gt; service, take the [S] instead, transfer at Beach 90 St.&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;For &lt;b&gt;Broad Channel&lt;/b&gt; [S] shuttle customers, take the [A] instead.&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;[ad]  For an accessible connection between the [A] train and [S] shuttle trains, transfer at &lt;b&gt;Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;.&lt;br&gt;&lt;b&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/b&gt;&lt;br/&gt;

                  &lt;a class="plannedWorkDetailLink" onclick=ShowHide(191353);&gt;&lt;b&gt;ROCKAWAYS: FLOOD PROTECTION | Until September 3, 2018&lt;br clear=left&gt;No [A] trains running to Far Rockaway-Mott Av&lt;br clear=left&gt;No [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br/&gt;&lt;br/&gt;&lt;div id= 191353 class="plannedWorkDetail" &gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/b&gt;[A] trains run between &lt;b&gt;Inwood-207 St&lt;/b&gt;, Manhattan and &lt;b&gt;Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St&lt;/b&gt;, Queens.&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;The [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle runs, approximately &lt;i&gt;every 15 minutes,&lt;/i&gt; between &lt;b&gt;Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St&lt;/b&gt; and &lt;b&gt;Beach 90 St&lt;/b&gt; and via the [A]  &lt;i&gt;to/from&lt;/i&gt; &lt;b&gt;Far Rockaway-Mott Av&lt;/b&gt;.&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;For &lt;b&gt;Far Rockaway-Mott Av&lt;/b&gt; service, take the [S] instead, transfer at Beach 90 St.&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;For &lt;b&gt;Broad Channel&lt;/b&gt; [S] shuttle customers, take the [A] instead.&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;[ad]  For an accessible connection between the [A] train and [S] shuttle trains, transfer at &lt;b&gt;Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;.&lt;br&gt;&lt;b&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/b&gt;&lt;br/&gt;

                  &lt;br/&gt;

                  &lt;span class="DateStyle"&gt;

                &lt;P&gt;&lt;STRONG&gt;Q1, Q2, Q3, Q4, Q5, Q6, Q8, Q9, Q17, Q20A, Q20B, Q24, Q25, Q30, Q31, Q34, Q40,Â Q41, Q42, Q43,Â Q44-SBS, Q54, Q56, Q60, Q65Â Q83, Q84, Q85, Q110, Q111, Q112, Q113-LTD,&lt;/STRONG&gt; &lt;STRONG&gt;Q114-LTD &lt;/STRONG&gt;and &lt;STRONG&gt;X68&lt;/STRONG&gt;Â buses are running with delays in both directions, because of trafficÂ on Jamaica Av, Sutphin Blvd, Archer Av, 168Â St and Hillside Av.Â &lt;/P&gt;

                  &lt;span class="TitleDelay"&gt;Delays&lt;/span&gt;
                  &lt;span class="DateStyle"&gt;
                  &amp;nbsp;Posted:&amp;nbsp;07/31/2018&amp;nbsp; 2:39PM
                  &lt;/span&gt;
                  &lt;br/&gt;
                  &lt;br/&gt;
                &lt;STRONG&gt;Q12, Q13, Q15, Q15A, Q16, Q17, Q19, Q20A, Q20B, Q25, Q26, Q27, Q28, Q34, Q44-SBS, Q48, Q50, Q65&lt;/STRONG&gt; and &lt;STRONG&gt;Q66 &lt;/STRONG&gt;buses are running with delays in both directions because of traffic in the Downtown Flushing area.
              &lt;br/&gt;
              &lt;br/&gt;

                  &lt;span class="TitleDelay"&gt;Delays&lt;/span&gt;
                  &lt;span class="DateStyle"&gt;
                  &amp;nbsp;Posted:&amp;nbsp;07/31/2018&amp;nbsp; 2:29PM
                  &lt;/span&gt;
                  &lt;br/&gt;
                  &lt;br/&gt;
                &lt;STRONG&gt;B62,&lt;/STRONG&gt; &lt;STRONG&gt;Q32, Q39, Q60, Q66, Q67, Q100, Q101, &lt;/STRONG&gt;and&lt;STRONG&gt; Q102 &lt;/STRONG&gt;buses are running with delays in both directionsÂ because of traffic in the Queens Plaza area.
              &lt;br/&gt;
              &lt;br/&gt;

                  &lt;span class="TitlePlannedWork" &gt;Planned Detour&lt;/span&gt;
                  &lt;br/&gt;

                  &lt;span class="TitleServiceChange" &gt;Service Change&lt;/span&gt;
                  &lt;span class="DateStyle"&gt;
                  &amp;nbsp;Posted:&amp;nbsp;07/31/2018&amp;nbsp; 2:06PM
                  &lt;/span&gt;
                  &lt;br/&gt;
                  &lt;br/&gt;
                &lt;P&gt;&lt;STRONG&gt;S52&lt;/STRONG&gt; buses are detoured because of construction on Norway Av between McClean Av and Olympia Blvd. &lt;/P&gt;
&lt;P&gt;Detour is as follows:&lt;/P&gt;
&lt;P&gt;&lt;STRONG&gt;St George Ferry-bound:&lt;/STRONG&gt; Via Olympia Blvd, right on Lamport Blvd, right on McClean Av and then resume their regular route.&lt;/P&gt;
&lt;P&gt;&lt;STRONG&gt;Hospital-bound:&lt;/STRONG&gt; Via McClean Av, Lamport Blvd, left on Olympia Blvd and then resume their regular route.&lt;/P&gt;
              &lt;br/&gt;

    <name>Pascack Valley</name>
    <status>SERVICE CHANGE</status>
    <text>
                    &lt;span class="TitleServiceChange" &gt;Service Change&lt;/span&gt;
                    &lt;span class="DateStyle"&gt;
                    &amp;nbsp;Posted:&amp;nbsp;07/27/2018&amp;nbsp; 2:44AM
                    &lt;/span&gt;&lt;br/&gt;&lt;br/&gt;
                  &lt;body bgcolor='White' style='font-family:sans-serif;font-size:10pt;'&gt;&lt;font face="sans-serif"&gt;&lt;span style="font-size: 13.3333px;"&gt;Service Adjustments Required To Advance Positive Train Control (PTC) Equipment Installation. Beginning Monday, June 4th, some weekday trains will be temporarily discontinued or will have changes to trip origin or destination. This will impact customers along the NEC, NJCL, M&amp;E and PVL. Other trains throughout the system will have adjustments to schedules and/or station stops. Visit njtransit.com for more information.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/body&gt;
                &lt;br/&gt;&lt;br/&gt;
              </text>
    <Date>07/27/2018</Date>
    <Time> 2:44AM</Time>
